DOC.detailed_description: A sufficient number subject enrol achieve require minimum cell culture-positive specimen sample type , nasal swab , nasopharyngeal swab , nasopharyngeal aspirate/wash . - The 510 ( k ) study include combine result site require follow three sample type : minimum 50 fresh positive result influenza A , 30 fresh positive result influenza B . - The CLIA Waiver submission include combine result site total 120 positive specimen influenza A influenza B . The nasal swab primary sample type plan CLIA Waiver submission . However , depend upon prevalence influenza , nasopharyngeal swab and/or nasopharyngeal aspirate/wash may also submit CLIA Waiver .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male Female , age ( assume appropriate consent obtain ) . 2 . Must currently exhibit symptom characteristic influenzalikeillness ( ILI ) . For example : 1 . Fever , ≥ 38º C ( 100º F ) , either time visit onset within past two ( 2 ) day . 2 . Nasal congestion 3 . Rhinorrhea 4 . Sore throat 5 . Cough 6 . Headache 7 . Myalgia 8 . Malaise 1 .
